name: Faulty Control
description:
Menu Navigation: Up and  Down keys to navigate + Enter to select

Controls: Arrow keys to begin with. But you may find that WASD and IJKL become relevant too.

Exposition: You've sent your pet robot down to County Roll Crystal Mines to explore and collect some keepsakes. As you delve further, you hear a strange rumbling noise... A FLOOD IS COMING! Use your reflexes and the faulty control panel you're controlling your robot with to help it escape to the surface.
Your control panel will randomly switch keys, so pay attention and react quickly to maintain control.

Submission to GMTK Game Jam 2020. Theme: Out of Control
This game fits the theme by making the player react quickly in order to maintain control of their character.

Credits:

  • Programmers: Deven Layton & Dorian Cauwe
  • Artist: Ava Layton
